title: Gourmet Pantry
description: Great selection of premium, shelf-stable ingredients and delicacies to elevate your everyday coocking.

title: Spirits
description: A refined collection of premium liquors and craft spirits from around the world.

title: Frozen
description: Deliciously chill treats — artisanal ice creams and mochi for every sweet craving.

title: Charcuterie & Cheeses
description: A handpicked selection of Spanish, Italian, and English cured meats and cheeses — rich in tradition and flavor.

title: Bread
description: Artisan sourdough loaves, naturally leavened and baked to perfection for rich, complex flavor.

title: Wine
description: A thoughtfully curated wine collection, highlighting Italian and French classics, with global selections to suit every palate.

title: Meats & Specials
description: Premium cuts and seasonal specialties — carefully selected by our supplier for flavor and freshness.

title: Coffee counter
description: Freshly brewed coffees and specialty blends crafted to energize your day.
